ingredients: 1 sheet frozen puff pastry - thawed, unfolded, and lightly rolled, 2  Bartlett pears, halved and cored, 2  d'Anjou pears, halved and cored, 1  red pear, halved and cored, 2 tablespoons white sugar,   +   1/2  lemon, juiced,   +   1/2 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened,   +   1/2 cup confectioners' sugar,   +   1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 tablespoon turbinado sugar
nutrition: Total Fat 17g 21%, Saturated Fat 6g 30%, Cholesterol 15mg 5%, Sodium 118mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 43g 16%, Dietary Fiber 4g 14%, Total Sugars 23g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 10mg 49%, Calcium 29mg 2%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 175mg 4%
